title: RocketTheme - RT Nuance premium template (J 3.X & 2.5)
description:
Nuance is a truly multi-purposed design, suitable for corporate, creative or other web environments. The transparent nature of the template allows the background colors to bleed through to the forefront, to complement and embellish your content.

Display a search module directly into the dropdown menu. A Font Awesome search icon reveals a search module in a dropdown. To activate, use the menu-item-search Custom CSS Class, load an Inline Module with Menu Direction set to Left.

The Dropdown Menu is CSS based menu, which has a custom underline animated effect, alongside many menu options, such as: inline subtext, icons, modules, custom column widths and number, as well as menu item distribution between columns.

A responsive layout adapts automatically to the viewing device's width, such as mobile, tablet or desktop, without the need for a separate layout or content. Mobile modes have a unique menu to aid usability. 960px and 1200px fixed layout options are also available.
